metadata.title: CVE-2020-10573 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Janus through 0.9.1. janus_audiobridge.c has adouble mutex unlock when listing private rooms in AudioBridge.

criterions.comment: janus: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
